markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Shield 0"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Meteor Shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=13)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Shield Throw 30 ft." url="/Traits.aspx?ID=490" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 21 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
**Price** 4 gp

**AC Bonus** 2 

**Speed Penalty** —
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Bulk** 1

**Hardness** 4

**HP (BT)** 16 (8)
</row>

</column>

---

Meteor shields are specifically designed with throwing in mind. A meteor shield is made from thin steel and has quick-release straps, allowing for easy, long-distance throws.

<title level="2">Specific Magic Shields</title>
[Helmsman's Recourse](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1858)
name: Meteor Shield
